misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a celebrated figure from Keimola Golf, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Timo has secured three Hector Trophée victories in his eight appearances. While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent performance underscores his commitment to the sport.

Beyond his achievements on the course, Timo is renowned for his dedication to the AimPoint method for putting. His enthusiastic endorsement of this technique has made him a sought-after mentor for aspiring golfers. Although Timo will not be competing in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his influence on the tournament remains significant, and a last-minute change could always see him return to the field.
